sources.title: Man Accused
sources.description: Title: Man Accused Summary: Just after he has become engaged to a baronet's daughter, Bob Jenson is arrested for robbery and murder. He breaks jail, tracks down the real criminals and hands them over to the authorities. Directed by: Montgomery Tully Actors: Ronald Howard, Carol Marsh, Ian Fleming Production Company: Danziger Productions Ltd. Release Date: October 1959 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Just after he has become engaged to a baronet's daughter, Bob Jenson is arrested for robbery and murder. He breaks jail, tracks down the real criminals and hands them over to the authorities.

metadata.Plot: Just after he has become engaged to a baronet's daughter, Bob Jenson is arrested for robbery and murder. He breaks jail, tracks down the real criminals and hands them over to the authorities.
